comments.body:
You'll need to use the connection info in each of the test tasks: 
    <<: *aws_connection_info

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +3,7 @@- name: set connection information for all tasks
  set_fact:
    aws_connection_info: &aws_connection_info
      aws_access_key: "{{ aws_access_key }}"
      aws_secret_key: "{{ aws_secret_key }}"

comments.body:
This action requires dms-vpc-role.
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/dms/latest/userguide/CHAP_Security.APIRole.html
https://forums.aws.amazon.com/thread.jspa?messageID=694553
```
botocore.errorfactory.AccessDeniedFault: An error occurred (AccessDeniedFault) when calling the CreateReplicationSubnetGroup operation: The IAM Role arn:aws:iam::112233445566:ro
le/dms-vpc-role is not configured properly.

fatal: [testhost]: FAILED! => {
    "changed": false,
    "error": {
        "code": "AccessDeniedFault",
        "message": "The IAM Role arn:aws:iam::112233445566:role/dms-vpc-role is not configured properly."
    },
```
Examples of creating a required role in a test can be seen in https://github.com/ansible/ansible/tree/devel/test/integration/targets/aws_codepipeline  or https://github.com/ansible/ansible/tree/devel/test/integration/targets/aws_secret/

Hello , 

this should now work, would you mind trying again please ?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +54,58 @@    - name: create replication subnet group
      dms_replication_subnet_group:
        state: present
        identifier: "{{ dms_sg_identifier }}"
        description: "Development Subnet Group"
